## getScope() function

Gets the [state](./store.scopedstate.md) of a scope

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getScope(state: State, scope: string): ScopedState
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                      | Description                           |
| --------- | ------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| state     | [State](./store.state.md) | The current [state](./store.state.md) |
| scope     | string                    | The scope                             |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ScopedState](./store.scopedstate.md)

The [state](./store.scopedstate.md) of the specified scope
